title: Snow Menace
desc:
*Not named Frosty. Not a happy jolly soul. Will stuff a corncob pipe through your neck.*

Prepare for a potentially lengthy fight. In addition to its high HP, this snowman's attacks will apply the Chilled debuff to you, reducing your own damage.

Don't bring a low damage weapon to this fight if you can avoid it, or provide some means to reduce the snowman's low damage even further.
